message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you halfway at $12,500. My maximum budget remains at $10,000. Could you consider coming down to this amount?
